backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining user profiles, transactions, game settings, coupons, manual payments, and admin-controlled credit updates with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping specific UI/UX requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose and UI behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, dark mode tokens, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main routing configuration wiring all pages, admin routes with guards, authentication flow, and theme provider setup.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentSet: Admin UI for configuring Stripe with secret key and allowed countries, including validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Component that checks admin status and redirects unauthorized users while showing skeleton loading UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal form for completing initial profile setup, validating inputs and submitting to backend with referral handling.
frontend/src/components/common/PageHeade: Reusable page header showing title, optional description, badge, and action elements.
frontend/src/components/common/PremiumSp: Animated premium-styled loading spinner with configurable size.
frontend/src/components/game/OutcomeEffe: Displays visual win, miss, or loss animations based on game outcome with timed auto-hide.
frontend/src/components/game/SpinWheel.t: Manages spin wheel rendering, image loading diagnostics, and deterministic spin animation to match game outcome.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with navigation, background visuals, user profile data, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/wallet/BalanceTi: Animates displayed balance to smoothly count toward the latest value.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor APIs, including user profile, payments, admin values, and game actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and a dark-themed OKLCH design system with custom utility classes and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Provides admin entry points for user management, wheel config, withdrawals, and manual payments.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminManualPaym: Allows admins to review, approve, or decline manual payment requests and configure QR/instructions.
Admin page that displays leaderboard users, allows copying principals, and editing user credit balances via a dialog.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWheelConfi: Admin page for viewing and updating the house edge and displaying wheel segment probabilities.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWithdrawal: Admin withdrawals placeholder page showing pending withdrawals with functionality not yet implemented.
frontend/src/pages/BuyCreditsPage.tsx: Implements the credits purchase UI with package selection, custom amounts, QR dialog flow, and manual payment request creation.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Renders the spinning game interface, manages spin actions, displays outcomes, and shows animations and toasts.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Presents the login screen using Internet Identity with a styled premium UI layout.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentFailu: Displays a failed payment submission message with options to retry or return to the game.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentSucce: Shows the status of a manual payment request, refreshing related queries and displaying status-specific messaging.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays the user's profile, showing identity, balance, stats, and badges with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionsPage.tsx: Shows a full transaction history with icons, amounts, and loading placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/UnauthorizedPage.tsx: Renders an accessâ€‘denied message with a button to return to the main game.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Displays current balance, recent transactions, and navigation buttons for buying credits or withdrawing.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawPage.tsx: Shows withdrawal info and notes that withdrawal functionality is still under development.
frontend/src/utils/assetUrl.ts: Builds asset URLs based on Vite's base path, normalizing slashes.
frontend/src/utils/creditPricing.ts: Utility functions for deriving credits-per-INR ratios and computing credits from INR amounts.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Helpers for formatting INR and converting between rupees and paise.
frontend/src/utils/generatedAssets.ts: Defines static paths for generated wheel and visual effect assets.
frontend/src/utils/razorpay.ts: Empty placeholder file for Razorpay utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling class-based dark mode, custom theme extensions, animations, and plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing spinner visibility issues, existing features, and project context for improving loading feedback.
